```{julia}
using Pkg
Pkg.activate(".")
using Revise

using MMJMesh.Meshes
using MMJMesh.Utilities
using MMJMesh.Topologies

m = makemeshonrectangle(9.0, 4.2, 11, 7)

nnodes(m::Mesh) = nentities(m.topology, 0)
node(m::Mesh, idx::Int) = Node(m, idx)
edge(m::Mesh, idx::Int) = Edge(m, idx)
face(m::Mesh, idx::Int) = Face(m, idx)
solid(m::Mesh, idx::Int) = Solid(m, idx)

f1 = edge(m, 2)

dimension(f1)

# links(f1, 1)
# nnodes(m)

pc = PlotMeshConfiguration()
pc.nodes.visible = true
pc.hidedecorations = true
plotMesh(m, pc)
```
